question: Which of these summary statistics always has a unique value for a given dataset?

answers.feedback: Incorrect. When the number of points in a dataset is even, there is not a single data value in the middle of the dataset. In this case, the value of the median can be defined in different ways.
Incorrect. There may be multiple values that all occur the same number of times, and there is no unique mode in such a case.

question: Which of these statistics is less sensitive to outliers?

answers.feedback: Incorrect. The sample mean can change significantly in the presence of outliers.
Correct. Because the median returns a value in the middle of the dataset, it is not significantly affected by the particular values of outliers.
